title: Maori moods and melodies
creator_credit: Robert Steele, New Zealand. Government Tourist Bureau and Neuline Film Productions
brief_description: New Zealand, home of the Maori people; steaming geysers, bubbling mud and dense forests; snow-lined mountains and turbulent water falls; the fine art of carving; and dancing.
